= Music Credits =

All the music used in this game is available free for download from the [http://modarchive.org/ Mod Archive]. Each song is in its original module format with the information intact with regards to each song's title and author. Each song is the copyright of its respective author, and is not for commercial use unless permission or licensing is granted by the author.
